short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to help people with ADHD improve their reading focus and comprehension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SplitBold literally bolds half of the words which allows all users to focus on the First half of the next word without being overwhelmed. This can be a great tool to activate when you see long blogs or even a large group of paragraphs. For some that have a hard time reading the last part of a word this is for you.
